thread.title: BRIEF-Serinus Energy Reports ‍Qtrly Net Loss From Continuing Operations Per Share Of $0.06​

title: BRIEF-Serinus Energy Reports ‍Qtrly Net Loss From Continuing Operations Per Share Of $0.06​
text: March 20, 2018 / 11:30 PM / Updated 23 minutes ago BRIEF-Serinus Energy Reports ‍Qtrly Net Loss From Continuing Operations Per Share Of $0.06​ Reuters Staff March 20 (Reuters) - Serinus Energy Inc: * SERINUS ANNOUNCES 2017 FINANCIAL AND OPERATING RESULTS * ‍QTRLY NET LOSS FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS PER SHARE $0.06​ * ‍PRODUCTION VOLUMES DECREASED BY 65% IN Q4 2017 TO 396 BOE/D, AS COMPARED TO 1,131 BOE/D IN Q4 OF 2016​ * QTRLY FUNDS FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS LOSS PER SHARE $0.04 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
